body:
A few additional things

- DontShow isn't documented in `about_functions_advanced_parameters` cc @sdwheeler / @michaeltlombardi 
- In my time of using PowerShell I've not seen a great usecase for it, though clearly others have
- There are are only 10 instances of `DontShow` showing in the PowerShell codebase (inc comments) 
- There are many instances of it being used as per the following searches
  - https://github.com/search?q=%5BParameter%28DontShow%29&type=code  -  [Parameter(DontShow) - 7.3k files
  - https://github.com/search?q=%5BParameter%28Mandatory+%3D+%24false%2C+DontShow+%3D+%24true%29&type=code - [Parameter(Mandatory = $false, DontShow = $true) - 4 files 

So this may be worthwhile to do but is likely a low priority for the team but have assigned this to what I think are the appropriate working groups
